Articles.Content:
I've been working on de-orbiting space junk using a grabber made from stock parts. Mine was eventually successful, but it took a lot of tries. I found that rendezvous and close maneuvering where not nearly as difficult as getting a good grip on the target.

So, what kind of claw setup to you use for your debris capture? Is it made from stock parts? Here are a couple pics of my own "Debris Grabber" design.

<a href="http://imgur.com/QWmH2"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/QWmH2.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>/IMG]

<a href="http://imgur.com/xJfXB"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/xJfXB.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" alt="" /></a>/IMG]

Edited August 25, 2012 by Pyotor Gagarin
fixing a picture insertion fail
The Robotics mod is best for claw making imo, but the hard part of debris capture is rendevousing close enough..

Take that space junk!

I'm going to have to try this sometime.
